front.title: Stateful PCE Initiated LSP Setup Using Association Groups

abstract.t: This document describes a hierarchical model for stateful PCE- initiated LSPs, based on the PCE association group mechanism. It defines two new association types, and introduces a generic mechanism for stateful PCE to use P2P LSPs as component LSPs (i.e. sub-LSPs) to construct and set up TE LSPs with complex path topology, including P2MP, MP2P, and MP2MP TE LSPs.
